verses.verse: And he brought<WH935> me to the temple<WH1964>, and measured<WH4058> the posts<WH352>, six<WH8337> cubits<WH520> broad<WH7341> on the one side<WH6311>, and six<WH8337> cubits<WH520> broad<WH7341> on the other side<WH6311>, which was the breadth<WH7341> of the tabernacle<WH168>.

And the breadth<WH7341> of the entrance<WH6607> was ten<WH6235> cubits<WH520>; and the sides<WH3802> of the entrance<WH6607> were five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> on the one side<WH2568>, and five cubits<WH520> on the other side<WH4058>: and he measured the length<WH753> thereof<WH705>, forty cubits<WH520>, and the breadth<WH7341>, twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520>.

Then went<WH935> he inward<WH6441>, and measured<WH4058> each post<WH352> of the entrance<WH6607>, two<WH8147> cubits<WH520>; and the entrance<WH6607>, six<WH8337> cubits<WH520>; and the breadth<WH7341> of the entrance<WH6607>, seven<WH7651> cubits<WH520>.

And he measured<WH4058> the length<WH753> thereof<WH6242>, twenty cubits<WH520>, and the breadth<WH7341>, twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520>, before<WH6440> the temple<WH1964>: and he said<WH559> unto me<WH6944>, This is the most holy place<WH6944>.

Then he measured<WH4058> the wall<WH7023> of the house<WH1004>, six<WH8337> cubits<WH520>; and the breadth<WH7341> of every side-chamber<WH6763>, four<WH702> cubits<WH520>, round about<WH5439> the house<WH1004> on every side<WH5439>.

And the side<WH6763> - chambers<WH6763> were in three<WH7969> stories<WH6763>, one over another, and thirty<WH7970> in order<WH6471>; and they entered<WH935> into the wall<WH7023> which belonged to the house<WH1004> for the side-chambers<WH6763> round about<WH5439>, that they might have hold<WH270> therein<WH270>, and not have hold in the wall<WH7023> of the house<WH1004>.

And the side-chambers<WH6763> were broader<WH7337> as they encompassed<WH5437> the house higher<WH4605> and higher<WH4141>; for the encompassing of the house<WH1004> went higher and higher<WH4605> round about<WH4141> the house<WH1004>: therefore the breadth<WH7341> of the house<WH1004> continued upward<WH4605>; and so one went up<WH5927> from the lowest<WH8481> chamber to the highest<WH5945> by the middle chamber<WH8484>.

I saw<WH7200> also that the house<WH1004> had a raised<WH1363> basement round about<WH5439>: the foundations<WH4328> of the side-chambers<WH6763> were a full<WH4393> reed<WH7070> of six<WH8337> great<WH679> cubits<WH520>.

The thickness<WH7341> of the wall<WH7023>, which was for the side-chambers<WH6763>, on the outside<WH2351>, was five<WH2568> cubits<WH520>: and that which was left<WH3240> was the place<WH1004> of the side-chambers<WH6763> that belonged to the house<WH1004>.
And between the chambers<WH3957> was a breadth<WH7341> of twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520> round about<WH5439> the house<WH1004> on every side<WH5439>.

And the doors<WH6607> of the side-chambers<WH6763> were toward the place that was left<WH3240>, one<WH259> door<WH6607> toward<WH1870> the north<WH6828>, and another<WH259> door<WH6607> toward the south<WH1864>: and the breadth<WH7341> of the place<WH4725> that was left<WH3240> was five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> round about<WH5439>.

And the building<WH1146> that was before<WH6440> the separate place<WH1508> at the side<WH6285> toward<WH1870> the west<WH3220> was seventy<WH7657> cubits<WH520> broad<WH7341>; and the wall<WH7023> of the building<WH1146> was five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> thick<WH7341> round about<WH5439>, and the length<WH753> thereof ninety<WH8673> cubits<WH520>.

So he measured<WH4058> the house<WH1004>, a hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520> long<WH753>; and the separate place<WH1508>, and the building<WH1140>, with the walls<WH7023> thereof<WH3967>, a hundred cubits<WH520> long<WH753>;
also the breadth<WH7341> of the face<WH6440> of the house<WH1004>, and of the separate place<WH1508> toward the east<WH6921>, a hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520>.

And he measured<WH4058> the length<WH753> of the building<WH1146> before<WH6440> the separate place<WH1508> which was at the back<WH310> thereof<WH862>, and the galleries thereof on the one side and on the other side<WH3967>, a hundred cubits<WH520>; and the inner<WH6442> temple<WH1964>, and the porches<WH197> of the court<WH2691>;

the thresholds<WH5592>, and the closed<WH331> windows<WH2474>, and the galleries<WH862> round about<WH5439> on their three stories<WH7969>, over against<WH5048> the threshold<WH5592>, ceiled<WH7824> with wood<WH6086> round about<WH5439>, and from the ground<WH776> up to the windows<WH2474>, (now the windows<WH2474> were covered<WH3680>),

to the space above the door<WH6607>, even unto the inner<WH6442> house<WH1004>, and without<WH2351>, and by all the wall<WH7023> round about<WH5439> within<WH6442> and without<WH2435>, by measure<WH4060>.
And it was made<WH6213> with cherubim<WH3742> and palm-trees<WH8561>; and a palm-tree<WH8561> was between cherub<WH3742> and cherub<WH3742>, and every cherub<WH3742> had two<WH8147> faces<WH6440>;

so that there was the face<WH6440> of a man<WH120> toward the palm-tree<WH8561> on the one side<WH6440>, and the face of a young lion<WH3715> toward the palm-tree<WH8561> on the other side<WH6213>. thus was it made through all the house<WH1004> round about<WH5439>:
from the ground<WH776> unto above the door<WH6607> were cherubim<WH3742> and palm-trees<WH8561> made<WH6213>; thus was the wall<WH7023> of the temple<WH1964>.

As for the temple<WH1964>, the door-posts<WH4201> were squared<WH7251>; and as for the face<WH6440> of the sanctuary<WH6944>, the appearance<WH4758> thereof was as the appearance of the temple<WH4758>.

The altar<WH4196> was of wood<WH6086>, three<WH7969> cubits<WH520> high<WH1364>, and the length<WH753> thereof two<WH8147> cubits<WH520>; and the corners<WH4740> thereof<WH753>, and the length thereof<WH7023>, and the walls thereof<WH6086>, were of wood: and he said<WH1696> unto me<WH7979>, This is the table that is before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>.
And the temple<WH1964> and the sanctuary<WH6944> had two<WH8147> doors<WH1817>.

And the doors<WH1817> had two<WH8147> leaves<WH1817> apiece<WH8147>, two turning<WH4142> leaves<WH1817>: two<WH8147> leaves for the one<WH259> door<WH1817>, and two<WH8147> leaves<WH1817> for the other<WH312>.

And there were made<WH6213> on them<WH1817>, on the doors of the temple<WH1964>, cherubim<WH3742> and palm-trees<WH8561>, like as were made<WH6213> upon the walls<WH7023>; and there was a threshold<WH5646> of wood<WH6086> upon the face<WH6440> of the porch<WH197> without<WH2351>.

And there were closed<WH331> windows<WH2474> and palm-trees<WH8561> on the one side and on the other side<WH3802>, on the sides of the porch<WH197>: thus were the side-chambers<WH6763> of the house<WH1004>, and the thresholds<WH5646>.
